title: Boards Level
body:
How can I level up on boards if I can't post a comment until level 6?
I did finally comment on a Dev Blog. But how do I level up on boards or even know what level I am?

replies.body: Usually when posting for the first time, your account needs to sync to the boards.  Usually a post will fix that up.  Everything looks okay for you now, and showing up as 30!
